comments: Gallinari (OKC) makes marginal contact with his right hand to Hill's (MEM) front during the drive.
Hill (MEM) extends his right arm unnaturally and initiates contact with Gallinari's (OKC) head/neck area, dislodging him from position.

call_type: Turnover: Lost Ball Out of Bounds
comments: After communicating with the Replay Center, the call on the floor of MEM ball was overturned to OKC ball.
Hill (MEM) hedges the pick and makes marginal body contact with Paul (OKC).
Hill (MEM) and Gilgeous-Alexander (OKC) make incidental arm contact with one another as they each attempt to retrieve the rebound.
Adams (OKC) and Clarke (MEM) engage and disengage after the release of the jump shot attempt.
Clarke (MEM) makes marginal contact with Gallinari's (OKC) front/side as he begins rolling out of his screening position.
Gilgeous-Alexander (OKC) cleanly blocks Hill's (MEM) jump shot attempt.
Schroder (OKC) briefly has his arm around Clarke's (MEM) upper half and slides it off in one continuous motion.
Paul (OKC) extends his left forearm into Morant's (MEM) front after his gather and affects his driving shot attempt.
Clarke (MEM) makes incidental contact with Gallinari's (OKC) right hand after making clean contact with the ball during rebounding.
Adams (OKC) slightly jumps from point A to point B and initiates some contact with Crowder's (MEM) left leg/foot after his gather, but it is marginal.
Clarke (MEM) makes contact with the ball after it has rolled out of the imaginary cylinder above the rim following Crowder's (MEM) shot attempt.
Gallinari (OKC) establishes himself in a screening position in Morant's (MEM) path and does not deliver the contact.
Crowder (MEM) makes marginal contact with Paul's (OKC) right foot at the start of his upward shooting motion.
Schroder (OKC) reaches in and makes some contact with Morant's (MEM) left arm during the drive, but it is marginal.
Paul (OKC) jumps into Clarke's (MEM) backside and initiates contact that dislodges him from his rebounding position.
Schroder (OKC) brings both hands to the ball inside the perimeter and loses control of it thereafter without taking another controlled dribble.
Brooks (MEM) makes marginal contact with Schroder's (OKC) right hip inside the perimeter.
Adams (OKC) has his left arm slightly extended into Morant's (MEM) path as contact occurs to Morant's arm/body during his upward shooting motion, but it is marginal and Morant initiates it.

Adams (OKC) grazes Clarke's (MEM) left arm during the put-back attempt, but the contact is marginal. Schroder (OKC) stays underneath Clarke's body following the rebound and as Clarke is attempting the put-back, but the contact is marginal.
Hill (MEM) commits the take foul on Schroder (OKC).
Brooks (MEM) commits the take foul on Schroder (OKC).
Schroder (OKC) makes marginal body contact with Morant (MEM) in the back-court.
